typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderID as string,
		customerID as string,
		employeeID as string,
		orderDate as string,
		requiredDate as string,
		shippedDate as string,
		shipVia as string,
		freight as double,
		shipName as string,
		shipAddress as (street as string, city as string, region as string, postalCode as string, country as string),
		details as (productID as string, unitPrice as string, quantity as string, discount as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> cosmosDbSource
cosmosDbSource foldDown(unroll(details),
	mapColumn(
		customerID,
		details,
		employeeID = details,
		freight,
		orderDate,
		orderID,
		requiredDate,
		shipAddress,
		shipName,
		shipVia,
		shippedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['orders.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
